page.title: 06Education - My School - 1
page.content: My School - Lady St. Mary W'ham. The name of my school is Lady Saint Mary First School. It is next to Wareham Middle School. The Purbeck Upper School is a bit further away but close enough to walk to. We've got a common by our school, so we often use it for Science. The shape of our school is a sort of square. All the buildings are connected together and are fairly new. We've a hall which is quite big. We use it for a lot of things like assemblies, P.E., Drama and lunch. We've a playground as well. It's quite big and contains a boat, bars, logs and paintings for us to play on. We have a playing field where we play when it is dry. We're going to have a natural garden soon. We are planting plants and collecting insects at the moment for it. There are also flower beds around school.
